VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_ShipCooldo.label: ship cooldown
VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_ShipCooldo.description: Flushes the ship's engine with Anomaly nanites, rapidly venting waste heat and priming its systems for optimal performance.

VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_RevealInfo.label: reveal information
VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_RevealInfo.description: Performs a psychic communication with the Void in an attempt to glean meaningful information, though the initiator may fall unconscious for several hours.

VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_FleshSeali.label: flesh sealing
VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_FleshSeali.description: Weakens the fleshmass nucleus and encases it with shaders, transforming it into a vessel for chemfuel production.

VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_DarkInfusi.label: dark infusion
VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_DarkInfusi.description: Releases shader nanites to permeate the area, granting all allied units within the zone the ability to breathe safely in space while shielding them from extreme cold.

VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_TwistedRec.label: twisted reconstruction
VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_TwistedRec.description: Channels Void energy to warp and restructure all of the target's equipped gear, altering its persona an components while fully repairing its durability.

VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_ParallelDi.label: parallel dimension
VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_ParallelDi.description: Consumes vast quantities of Biometal while maximizing ritual energy, transporting the entire region to a nearby similar dimension. This process refreshes all local landmarks and repairs grav launch ruins.

VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_GoldenCana.label: golden canary
VoidUniverse.PsychicRitualDef_GoldenCana.description: Fuses the Gold Canary husk with the Golden Cube, granting it true life.
